summary:
A soap opera is a long-running TV or radio show with lots of drama and emotional stories. The name comes from old radio shows sponsored by soap companies. These shows have many characters and their stories overlap, often leaving viewers on a cliffhanger.

The longest-running radio soap is *The Archers*, and *Coronation Street* holds the record for TV. *Guiding Light* is the longest-running soap overall, starting on radio in 1937. Soap operas are popular, especially during the day, and can make a lot of money from advertising.
title: Soap opera
